description.p: This development package provides the header files and the symbolic links to allow compilation and linking of programs that use the libraries provided in the libgmp3 package. This package includes 32 bit versions of the link libraries.
Both C and C++ bindings are present in this package. Package libstdc++-dev is required to use the C++ bindings.
The MPFR library (multiple-precision floating-point) used to be included, but has since been moved to package libmpfr-dev.
